plot: Through one year, in a hotel room, Marta, Pilar and Manuel try to decide what keeps them together and apart. If life as a couple is complicated, what happens when the love of your life is two people?
title: Cuatro estaciones y un día
plot_es: Through one year, in a hotel room, Marta, Pilar and Manuel try to decide what keeps them together and apart. If life as a couple is complicated, what happens when the love of your life is two people?
plot_en: Through one year, in a hotel room, Marta, Pilar and Manuel try to decide what keeps them together and apart. If life as a couple is complicated, what happens when the love of your life is two people?
